md:
giải nghĩa từ "saying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Saying (n) - Câu nói, câu nói tục ngữ, câu tục ngữ
	+ Meaning: A sentence or phrase that expresses a general truth or piece of advice.
	+ Example: "Actions speak louder than words" is a common saying.
	+ Related words: phrase, proverb, adage, maxim

* Saying (v) - Nói, nói rằng
	+ Meaning: To utter words so as to convey information, an opinion, or a feeling.
	+ Example: She's always saying that she's tired.
	+ Related words: speaking, telling, uttering, declaring

* Saying (n) - Câu nói, lời nói
	+ Meaning: A statement or remark.
	+ Example: His saying that he was going to quit surprised everyone.
	+ Related words: statement, remark, comment, observation
html:
giải nghĩa từ "saying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Saying (n) - Câu nói, câu nói tục ngữ, câu tục ngữ

    • Meaning: A sentence or phrase that expresses a general truth or piece of advice.
    • Example: "Actions speak louder than words" is a common saying.
    • Related words: phrase, proverb, adage, maxim

  • Saying (v) - Nói, nói rằng

    • Meaning: To utter words so as to convey information, an opinion, or a feeling.
    • Example: She's always saying that she's tired.
    • Related words: speaking, telling, uttering, declaring

  • Saying (n) - Câu nói, lời nói

    • Meaning: A statement or remark.
    • Example: His saying that he was going to quit surprised everyone.
    • Related words: statement, remark, comment, observation
